features: AI Assistant Critical Bug Fixes (Sprint 2 Days 1-2)
Fixed multiple observer registration bug causing duplicate element additions
Fixed AI Assistant save initialization and error handling
Added step counter and animated progress bar to AI Assistant
Fixed ISA Data Entry module to display AI Assistant saved data
Fixed step counter overflow (Step 12 of 11 bug)
Fixed connection approval button closure capture
Sprint 1 Navigation Components (ready to integrate)
Breadcrumb navigation module for multi-step workflows
Progress indicator module with step tracking
Navigation buttons component with dynamic state management
Complete internationalization across all modules (1,073 translations)
Support for 7 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Lithuanian, Portuguese, Italian
Reactive UI pattern for dynamic language switching without full page reload
All modal dialogs and notifications fully translated
Network Metrics Analysis Module with 7 centrality metrics
Interactive DataTable with all node metrics (sortable, searchable, filterable)
Confidence property system (1-5 scale) with visual feedback
Collapsible sidebar for CLD visualization
About dialog with version and system information
